[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Entwash Vale map.jpg|thumb|250px|Map of the Entwash Vale in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Entwash Vale''' was a green and fenny vale in [[Rohan]], formed at the lower [[Entwash]].<ref>{{TT|III2}}</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2012: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Entwash Vale is one of the four major subdivisions of the [[Eastemnet]]. It is ruled by Reeve Ingbert, rather of [[Horn (rider of Rohan)|Horn]], from the town of "Eaworth".
